services.reconfigure: Pārkonfigurējiet ZHA ierīci ( labot ierīci). Izmantojiet to, ja rodas problēmas ar ierīci. Ja attiecīgā ierīce ir ar akumulatoru darbināma ierīce, lūdzu, pārliecinieties, ka tā ir nomodā un pieņem komandas, kad izmantojat šo pakalpojumu.

config.introduction: Šeit iespējams konfigurēt Jūsu komponentus un pašu Home Assistant. Pagaidām ne visu ir iespējams konfigurēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni, bet mēs strādājam pie tā.

picker.introduction: Apgabali tiek izmantoti, lai organizētu ierīces atrašanās vietu. Šī informācija tiks izmantota daudzviet Home Assistant, lai palīdzētu organizēt lietotāja saskarni, atļaujas un integrācijas ar citām sistēmām.
picker.introduction2: Lai piesaistītu ierīces noteiktam apgabalam, izmantojiet zemāk esošo saiti, lai pārietu uz integrāciju lapu un tad noklikšķiniet uz konfigurētas integrācijas, lai nonāktu pie ierīču kartīšu saraksta.

detail.name: Nosaukums
detail.usage: A tag can trigger an automation when scanned, you can use NFC tags, QR codes or any other kind of tag. Use our {companion_link} to write this tag to a programmable NFC tag or create a QR code below.

helpers.caption: Palīgi

core_config.edit_requires_storage: Redaktors ir atspējots, jo konfigurācija ir definēta configuration.yaml.

dashboards.cant_edit_default: Standarta Lovelace infopaneli nevar rediģēt lietotāja saskarnē. Varat to paslēpt, iestatot citu infopaneli kā noklusēto.

detail.title: Nosaukums
detail.url_error_msg: URL ir jāsatur - un tajā nedrīkst būt atstarpes vai speciālās rakstzīmes, izņemot _ un -

resources.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this resource?
resources.refresh_body: You have to refresh the page to complete the removal. Do you want to refresh now?
resources.cant_edit_yaml: Jūs izmantojat Lovelace YAML režīmā, tāpēc jūs nevarat pārvaldīt savus resursus, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Pārvaldiet tos konfigurācijā.yaml.

detail.warning_text: Adding resources can be dangerous, make sure you know the source of the resource and trust them. Bad resources could seriously harm your system.

server_control.caption: Servera vadība

validation.heading: Konfigurācijas pārbaude
validation.introduction: Veiciet konfigurācijas pārbaudi, ja nesen esat veicis izmaiņas konfigurācijā un vēlaties pārliecināties, ka tā nesatur kļūdas

reloading.heading: YAML konfigurācijas pārlādēšana
reloading.introduction: Atsevišķas Home Assistant daļas var pārlādēt bez nepieciešamības restartēt. Veicot pārlādēšanu, pašreizējā YAML konfigurācija tiks atiestatīta un tiks ielādēta jaunā.
reloading.group: Pārlādēt grupas, grupas vienības un notify servisus
reloading.rest: Pārlādēt rest vienības un notify servisus

server_management.heading: Servera pārvaldība
server_management.introduction: Kontrolējiet savu Home Assistant serveri… no Home Assistant.
server_management.confirm_restart: Vai tiešām vēlaties restartēt Home Assistant?
server_management.confirm_stop: Vai tiešām vēlaties apturēt Home Assistant?

customize.caption: Pielāgojumi

picker.introduction: Uzlabojiet atribūtus katrai vienībai. Pievienotie jeb mainīties pielāgojumi stāsies spēkā nekavējoties. Noņemtie pielāgojumi stāsies spēkā, kad vienība tiks atjaunināta.

warning.include_sentence: It seems that your configuration.yaml doesn't properly
warning.not_applied: Veiktās izmaiņas ir saglabātas, bet netiks piemērotas pēc konfigurācijas pārlādēšanas, ja tajā nav include.

customize.attributes_customize: Šie atribūti jau ir iestatīti customize.yaml konfigurācijā
customize.attributes_outside: Šie atribūti tiek pielāgoti ārpus customize.yaml
customize.different_include: Possibly via a domain, a glob or a different include.
customize.attributes_set: Šie vienības atribūti ir iestatīti programmatiski.
customize.attributes_not_set: Šie atribūti netika iestatīti. Iestatiet tos, ja vēlaties.

picker.introduction: Automatizācijas redaktors ļauj jums izveidot un rediģēt automatizācijas. Lūdzu, sekojiet saitei zemāk, lai pārliecinātos, ka esat pareizi konfigurējis Home Assistant.
picker.only_editable: Rediģēt var tikai tās automatizācijas, kas definētas automations.yaml.
picker.delete_confirm: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst šo automatizāciju?

editor.introduction: Lietojiet automatizācijas, lai iedzīvinātu Jūsu mājās
editor.load_error_not_editable: Tikai "automations.yaml" failā esošās automatizācijas ir rediģējamas.
editor.unsaved_confirm: Jums ir nesaglabātas izmaiņas. Vai tiešām vēlaties pamest?

modes.label: Mode
modes.description: The mode controls what happens when the automation is triggered while the actions are still running from a previous trigger. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.

triggers.name: Izsaukt
triggers.introduction: Trigeri ir tas, kas sāk automatizācijas noteikuma apstrādi. Vienam noteikumam ir iespējams norādīt vairākus trigerus. Kad trigeris sāk, Home Assistant apstiprina nosacījumus, ja tādi ir, un izsauc darbību.

conditions.name: Nosacījums
conditions.introduction: Nosacījumi nav obligāti, tos var izmantot, lai novērstu automatizācijas tālāku izpildi, ja vien nav izpildījušies visi priekšnosacījumi.

actions.name: Darbība
actions.introduction: Darbības nosaka, ko Home Assistant darīs, kad tiks aktivizēta automatizācija.

task_selection.introduction: Type below what this automation should do, and we will try to convert it into a Home Assistant automation.
task_selection.language_note: Note: Only English is supported for now.
task_selection.error_empty: Enter a command or tap skip.
task_selection.error_unsupported: We couldn't create an automation for that (yet?).

link_devices.header: Great! Now we need to link some devices
link_devices.ambiguous_entities: One or more devices have more than one matching entity, please pick the one you want to use.

picker.introduction: Skriptu redaktors ļauj jums izveidot un rediģēt skriptus. Lūdzu, izmantojiet zemāk esošo saiti, lai izlasītu instrukcijas, lai pārliecinātos, ka esat pareizi konfigurējis Home Assistant.

editor.id_already_exists_save_error: You can't save this script because the ID is not unique, pick another ID or leave it blank to automatically generate one.
editor.introduction: Izmantojiet skriptus, lai izpildītu darbību secību.

modes.label: Mode
modes.description: The mode controls what happens when script is invoked while it is still running from one or more previous invocations. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.

editor.load_error_not_editable: Rediģējami ir tikai scripts.yaml esošie skripti.
editor.delete_confirm: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst šo skriptu?

picker.introduction: Ainu redaktors ļauj Jums izveidot un rediģēt ainas. Lūdzu, sekojiet saitei zemāk, lai izlasītu instrukciju, ka Jūs esat pareizi konfigurējis Home Assistant.
picker.no_scenes: Mēs nevarējām atrast nevienu rediģējamu ainu
picker.only_editable: Rediģēt var tikai ainas, kas definētas scenes.yaml.
picker.delete_confirm: Vai tiešām vēlaties izdzēst šo ainu?

editor.introduction: Izmantojiet ainas, lai Jūsu mājas padarītu dzīvas.
editor.unsaved_confirm: Jums ir nesaglabātas izmaiņas. Vai tiešām vēlaties pamest?
editor.name: Nosaukums

devices.introduction: Pievienot ierīces kuras Jūs vēlaties iekļaut Jūsu ainā. Uzstādiet visu ierīču stāvokli kādu Jūs vēlaties šai ainai.

entities.introduction: Šeit var iestatīt vienības, kas nepieder nevienai ierīcei.
entities.device_entities: Ja pievienosiet vienību, kas pieder ierīcei, tad tā tiks pievienota.

cloud.description_features: Kontrolējiet prom no mājām, integrējieties ar Alexa un Google Assistant.

login.title: Cloud Login
login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
login.introduction2: This service is run by our partner
login.introduction2a: , a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
login.introduction3: Home Assistant Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
login.learn_more_link: Learn more about Home Assistant Cloud
login.alert_password_change_required: You need to change your password before logging in.
login.alert_email_confirm_necessary: You need to confirm your email before logging in.

forgot_password.title: Forgot password
forgot_password.subtitle: Forgot your password
forgot_password.instructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.check_your_email: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.

register.title: Register Account
register.headline: Start your free trial
register.information: Create an account to start your free one month trial with Home Assistant Cloud. No payment information necessary.
register.information2: The trial will give you access to all the benefits of Home Assistant Cloud, including:
register.feature_remote_control: Control of Home Assistant away from home
register.feature_webhook_apps: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
register.information3: This service is run by our partner
register.information3a: , a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
register.information4: By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
register.account_created: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.

account.thank_you_note: Thank you for being part of Home Assistant Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
account.integrations_introduction: Integrations for Home Assistant Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your Home Assistant instance publicly on the internet.

remote.title: Remote Control
remote.access_is_being_prepared: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
remote.info: Home Assistant Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
remote.instance_will_be_available: Your instance will be available at

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
alexa.enable_ha_skill: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
alexa.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.info: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
google.enable_ha_skill: Activate the Home Assistant skill for Google Assistant
google.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
google.enter_pin_info: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
google.enter_pin_hint: Enter a PIN to use security devices
google.sync_entities_404_message: Failed to sync your entities to Google, ask Google 'Hey Google, sync my devices' to sync your entities.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.info: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to Home Assistant from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
webhooks.no_hooks_yet: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
webhooks.link_learn_more: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

dialog_cloudhook.available_at: The webhook is available at the following URL:
dialog_cloudhook.managed_by_integration: This webhook is managed by an integration and cannot be disabled.
dialog_cloudhook.info_disable_webhook: If you no longer want to use this webhook, you can
dialog_cloudhook.confirm_disable: Are you sure you want to disable this webhook?

cloud.caption: Home Assistant Cloud

devices.add_prompt: No {name} have been added using this device yet. You can add one by clicking the + button above.
devices.caption: Ierīces
devices.name: Nosaukums

conditions.caption: Darīt kaut ko tikai tad, ja ...

devices.cant_edit: Rediģējamas ir tikai tās vienības, kas izveidotas, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni.
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids: Vai vēlaties pārdēvēt arī vienības ID no Jūsu vinībām?
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids_warning: This will not change any configuration (like automations, scripts, scenes, dashboards) that is currently using these entities! You will have to update them yourself to use the new entity IDs!
devices.confirm_delete: Vai tiešām vēlaties izdzēst šo ierīci?

picker.introduction: Home Assistant uztur visu vienību reģistru, kuras jebkad parādījušās un kuras var unikāli identificēt. Katrai no šīm vienībām piešķirts vienības ID, kas tiks rezervēts tikai šai vienībai.
picker.introduction2: Izmantojiet vienību reģistru, lai pārlabotu nosaukumu, mainītu vienības ID vai noņemtu ierakstu no Home Assistant.

enable_selected.confirm_text: Tas atkārtoti padarīs tās pieejamas Home Assistant, ja tās šobrīd ir atspējotas.

disable_selected.confirm_text: Atspējotās vienības netiks pievienotas Home Assistant.

remove_selected.confirm_text: Jums vajadzētu noņemt tos no Lovelace konfigurācijām un automatizācijām, ja tie satur šīs vienības.
remove_selected.confirm_partly_text: You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart Home Assistant before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?

person.caption: Personas
person.description: Pārvaldīt personas, kuras izseko Home Assistant.
person.introduction: Šeit jūs varat definēt personas izmantošanai Home Assistant.
person.note_about_persons_configured_in_yaml: Ievērībai: configuration.yaml konfigurētās personas nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni.
person.no_persons_created_yet: Izskatās, ka vēl neesat izveidojis nevienu personu.
person.confirm_delete: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst šo personu?
person.confirm_delete2: Visas šai personai piederošās ierīces kļus par nepiesaistītām.
person.person_not_found: Mēs nevarējām atrast personu, kuru mēģinājāt rediģēt.

detail.name: Vārds
detail.device_tracker_intro: Atlasiet ierīces, kas pieder šai personai.
detail.no_device_tracker_available_intro: Ja jums ir ierīces, kas norāda uz personas klātbūtni, jūs šeit varēsit tās piesaistīt personai. Pirmo ierīci varat pievienot, integrāciju lapā pievienojot klātbūtnes noteikšanas integrāciju.
detail.confirm_delete_user: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst lietotāja {name} kontu? Jūs joprojām varat izsekot lietotāju, taču persona vairs nevarēs pieteikties.

zone.caption: Zonas
zone.description: Pārvaldiet zonas, kurās vēlaties izsekot personām.
zone.introduction: Zonas ļauj norādīt noteiktus reģionus uz zemes. Kad cilvēks atrodas zonā, vienības stāvoklim tiks izmantots zonas nosaukums. Zonas var izmantotas kā aktivators vai nosacījums automatizācijās.
zone.no_zones_created_yet: Izskatās, ka vēl neesat izveidojis nevienu zonu.
zone.confirm_delete: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst šo zonu?
zone.configured_in_yaml: configuration.yaml konfigurētās zonas nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni.
zone.edit_home_zone: Mājas zonas rādiusu pagaidām nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Velciet marķieri kartē, lai pārvietotu mājas zonu.
zone.edit_home_zone_narrow: Mājas zonas rādiusu pagaidām nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Atrašanās vietu var mainīt no vispārējās konfigurācijas.
zone.home_zone_core_config: Jūsu mājas zonas atrašanās vietu var rediģēt no vispārējās konfigurācijas lapas. Mājas zonas rādiusu pagaidām nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Vai vēlaties pāriet uz vispārīgo konfigurāciju?

detail.name: Nosaukums
detail.passive_note: Pasīvās zonas netiek rādītas lietotāja saskarnē un netiek izmantotas kā atrašanās vieta ierīču izsekošanai. Tas ir noderīgi, ja vēlaties tās izmantot tikai automatizācijai.

integrations.caption: Integrācijas
integrations.no_integrations: Šķiet, ka jums pagaidām nav nokonfigurēta neviena integrācija. Noklikšķiniet uz pogas zemāk, lai pievienotu savu pirmo integrāciju!
integrations.note_about_integrations: Pagaidām ne visas integrācijas var nokonfigurēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni.

ignore.confirm_ignore: Vai tiešām nevēlaties iestatīt šo integrāciju? To varat atsaukt, augšējā labajā stūrī noklikšķinot uz “Rādīt ignorētās integrācijas” pārpildes izvēlnē.
ignore.confirm_delete_ignore: Tas ļaus integrācijai atkal parādīties starp atklātajām integrācijām. Atklāšanai var būt nepieciešama restartēšana vai nepieciešams ilgāks laiks.

config_entry.delete_confirm: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst šo integrāciju?
config_entry.restart_confirm: Restartēt Home Assistant, lai pabeigtu šīs integrācijas noņemšanu
config_entry.reload_restart_confirm: Restartējiet Home Assistant, lai pabeigtu šīs integrācijas pārlādēšanu

config_flow.not_all_required_fields: Ne visi obligātie lauki ir aizpildīti.

external_step.description: Šī soļa pabeigšanai ir nepieciešams apmeklēt ārēju tīmekļa vietni.

config_flow.loading_first_time: Lūdzu, uzgaidiet, kamēr tiek instalēta integrācija

users.caption: Lietotāji
users.users_privileges_note: Lietotāju grupa ir izstrādes procesā. Lietotājs nevarēs administrēt instalāciju, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Mēs joprojām pārbaudām pārvaldības API, lai pārliecinātos, ka tie pareizi ierobežo piekļuvi administratoriem.

node_query_stages.protocolinfo: Obtaining basic Z-Wave capabilities of this node from the controller
node_query_stages.probe: Checking if the node is awake/alive
node_query_stages.wakeup: Setting up support for wakeup queues and messages
node_query_stages.manufacturerspecific1: Obtaining manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
node_query_stages.nodeinfo: Obtaining supported command classes from the node
node_query_stages.nodeplusinfo: Obtaining Z-Wave+ information from the node
node_query_stages.manufacturerspecific2: Obtaining additional manufacturer and product ID codes from the node
node_query_stages.versions: Obtaining information about firmware and command class versions
node_query_stages.instances: Obtaining details about what instances or channels a device supports
node_query_stages.static: Obtaining static values from the device
node_query_stages.cacheload: Loading information from the OpenZWave cache file. Battery nodes will stay at this stage until the node wakes up.
node_query_stages.neighbors: Obtaining a list of the node's neighbors
node_query_stages.session: Obtaining infrequently changing values from the node
node_query_stages.dynamic: Obtaining frequently changing values from the node
node_query_stages.configuration: Obtaining configuration values from the node

refresh_node.title: Refresh Node Information
refresh_node.description: This will tell OpenZWave to re-interview a node and update the node's command classes, capabilities, and values.
refresh_node.battery_note: If the node is battery powered, be sure to wake it before proceeding
refresh_node.wakeup_instructions_source: Wakeup instructions are sourced from the OpenZWave community device database.

details.driverallnodesqueriedsomedead: All nodes have been queried. Some nodes were found dead
details.driverawakenodesqueries: All awake nodes have been queried
details.driverfailed: Failed to connect to Z-Wave controller

select_instance.introduction: You have more than one OpenZWave instance running. Which instance would you like to manage?
select_instance.none_found: We couldn't find an OpenZWave instance. If you believe this is incorrect, check your OpenZWave and MQTT setups and ensure that Home Assistant can communicate with your MQTT broker.

node_config.introduction: Manage the different configuration parameters for a Z-Wave node.
node_config.help_source: Config parameter descriptions and help text are provided by the OpenZWave project.
node_config.wakeup_help: Battery powered nodes must be awake to change their configuration. If the node is not awake, OpenZWave will attempt to update the node's configuration the next time it wakes up, which could be multiple hours (or days) later. Follow these steps to wake up your device:

zha.introduction: Here it is possible to configure the ZHA component. Not everything is possible to configure from the UI yet, but we're working on it.

add_device_page.pairing_mode: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
add_device_page.discovered_text: Devices will show up here once discovered.
add_device_page.no_devices_found: No devices were found, make sure they are in paring mode and keep them awake while discovering is running.
add_device_page.discovery_text: Šeit tiks parādītas atklātās ierīces. Izpildiet ierīces (-ču) instrukcijas un iestatiet ierīci (-es) pārī savienošanas režīmā.

network_management.introduction: Commands that affect the entire network

add.caption: Pievienot ierīces
add.description: Add devices to the Zigbee network

node_management.introduction: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
node_management.hint_battery_devices: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
node_management.hint_wakeup: Some devices such as Xiaomi sensors have a wake up button that you can press at ~5 second intervals that keep devices awake while you interact with them.
node_management.help_node_dropdown: Select a device to view per-device options.

clusters.help_cluster_dropdown: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
clusters.introduction: Clusters are the building blocks for Zigbee functionality. They separate functionality into logical units. There are client and server types and that are comprised of attributes and commands.

cluster_attributes.help_attribute_dropdown: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
cluster_attributes.help_get_zigbee_attribute: Get the value for the selected attribute.
cluster_attributes.help_set_zigbee_attribute: Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.

cluster_commands.help_command_dropdown: Select a command to interact with.

groups.caption: Grupas
groups.group_details: Here are all the details for the selected Zigbee group.
groups.create_group_details: Enter the required details to create a new zigbee group

group_binding.group_picker_help: Select a group to issue a bind command.
group_binding.cluster_selection_help: Select clusters to bind to the selected group.
group_binding.bind_button_help: Bind the selected group to the selected device clusters.
group_binding.unbind_button_help: Unbind the selected group from the selected device clusters.

zha.caption: ZHA

network_management.introduction: Palaist komandas, kas ietekmē Z-Wave tīklu. Jūs nesaņemsit atpakaļsaiti par to, vai vairums komandu ir izdevušās, taču varat pārbaudīt OZW žurnālu, lai mēģinātu to uzzināt.

node_management.introduction: Run Z-Wave commands that affect a single node. Pick a node to see a list of available commands.
node_management.nodes_hint: Select node to view per-node options
node_management.exclude_entity: Exclude this entity from Home Assistant

ozw_log.introduction: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.

network_status.network_starting_note: Tas var aizņemt kādu laiku atkarībā no Jūsu tīkla lieluma.
network_status.network_started_note_some_queried: Nomodā esoši megli ir ierindoti. Miega režimā esoši mezgli tiks ierindoti tiklīdz tie būs nomodā.

cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?

empty_state.title: Laipni lūgti mājās
empty_state.no_devices: Šī lapa ļauj jums kontrolēt savas ierīces, tomēr izskatās, ka vēl nav izveidotas ierīces. Lai sāktu darbu, dodieties uz integrācijas lapu.

safe-mode.description: Home Assistant ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in safe mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.

starting.description: Home Assistant is starting, please wait...

unused_entities.title: Neizmantotās vienības
unused_entities.available_entities: Šīs ir vienības, kuras Jums ir pieejamas, bet kuras vēl nav Lovelace UI.
unused_entities.select_to_add: Izvēlieties vienību, kuru vēlaties pievienot kartei, un pēc tam noklikšķiniet uz pogu pievienot karti.

add_entities.yaml_unsupported: You cannot use this function when using Lovelace UI in YAML mode.
add_entities.generated_unsupported: You can only use this function when you have taken control of the Lovelace UI.

views.confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view?
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards: Deleting this view will also remove the cards
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view? The view contains {number} cards that will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

reload_resources.refresh_body: You have to refresh the page to complete the reload. Do you want to refresh now?

raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_title: Are you sure you want to remove your Lovelace UI configuration?
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_text: We will automatically generate your Lovelace UI views with your areas and devices if you remove your Lovelace UI configuration.
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_changes: Jums ir nesaglabātas izmaiņas. Vai esat pārliecināts, ka vēlaties iziet?
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_comments: Jūsu konfigurācija satur komentāru(s), tie netiks saglabāti. Vai vēlaties turpināt?
raw_editor.resources_moved: Resursus vairs nevajadzētu pievienot Lovelace konfigurācijai, bet tos var pievienot Lovelace konfigurācijas panelī.

edit_lovelace.explanation: Šis nosaukums tiek parādīts virs visiem jūsu Lovelace skatiem.
edit_lovelace.title: Title

visibility.select_users: Select which users should see this view in the navigation

edit_badges.panel_mode: These badges will not be displayed because this view is in "Panel Mode".

edit_card.pick_card_view_title: Which card would you like to add to your {name} view?
edit_card.confirm_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel?

move_card.header: Choose a view to move the card to

suggest_card.header: We created a suggestion for you

save_config.header: Pārņemt kontroli pār savu Lovelace lietotāja saskarni
save_config.para: Šo infopaneli pašlaik konktrolē Home Assistant, automātiski atjauninot, kad kļūst pieejamas jaunas vienības vai Lovelace UI komponenti. Ja pārņemsiet kontroli, šis informācijas panelis vairs netiks automātiski atjaunināts. Izmēģinājumiem jūs vienmēr varat izveidot jaunu infopaneli konfigurācijā.
save_config.para_sure: Vai tiešām vēlaties pārņemt kontroli pār lietotāja saskarni?
save_config.yaml_mode: You are using YAML mode for this dashboard, which means you cannot change your Lovelace config from the UI. If you want to manage this dashboard from the UI, remove 'mode: yaml' from your Lovelace configuration in 'configuration.yaml.'.
save_config.yaml_control: To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
save_config.yaml_config: To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:

migrate.para_no_id: Šim elementam nav ID. Lūdzu, pievienojiet ID šim elementam 'ui-lovelace.yaml' failā.
migrate.para_migrate: Home Assistant var automātiski pievienot ID visām kartītēm un skatiem, nospiežot pogu "Pārvietot konfigurāciju".

action-editor.editor_service_data: Service data can only be entered in the code editor

alarm-panel.name: Alarm Panel
alarm-panel.description: The Alarm Panel card allows you to Arm and Disarm your alarm control panel integrations.

calendar.name: Kalendārs
calendar.description: Kalendāra kartītē tiek attēlots kalendārs ar dienas, nedēļas un saraksta skatiem

conditional.name: Conditional
conditional.description: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
conditional.condition_explanation: The card will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled.

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: The Entities card is the most common type of card. It groups items together into lists.
entities.edit_special_row: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button

entity.name: Vienība
entity.description: Vienības kartīte sniedz īsu pārskatu par jūsu vienības stāvokli.

button.name: Poga
button.description: The Button card allows you to add buttons to perform tasks.
button.default_action_help: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info will be shown.

entity-filter.name: Entity Filter
entity-filter.description: The Entity Filter card allows you to define a list of entities that you want to track only when in a certain state.

gauge.name: Gauge
gauge.description: The Gauge card is a basic card that allows visually seeing sensor data.

glance.name: Glance
glance.description: The Glance card is useful to group multiple sensors in a compact overview.

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.

logbook.name: Logbook
logbook.description: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.

history-graph.name: History Graph
history-graph.description: The History Graph card allows you to display a graph for each of the entities listed.

horizontal-stack.name: Horizontal Stack
horizontal-stack.description: The Horizontal Stack card allows you to stack together multiple cards, so they always sit next to each other in the space of one column.

humidifier.name: Mitrinātājs
humidifier.description: Mitrinātāja kartīte ļauj kontrolēt jūsu mitrinātāja vienību, sniedzot iespēju pielāgot vienības mitrumu un režīmu.

iframe.name: Tīmekļa lapa
iframe.description: The Webpage card allows you to embed your favorite webpage right into Home Assistant.

light.name: Gaisma
light.description: The Light card allows you to change the brightness of the light.

generic.manual_description: Need to add a custom card or just want to manually write the yaml?
generic.name: Name
generic.title: Title

map.name: Karte
map.description: Kartes kartīte ļauj attēlot vienības kartē.

markdown.name: Markdown
markdown.description: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.

media-control.name: Media Control
media-control.description: The Media Control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.

picture.name: Attēls
picture.description: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.

picture-elements.name: Picture Elements
picture-elements.description: The Picture Elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.

picture-entity.name: Picture Entity
picture-entity.description: The Picture Entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.

picture-glance.name: Picture Glance
picture-glance.description: The Picture Glance card shows an image and corresponding entity states as an icon. The entities on the right side allow toggle actions, others show the more information dialog.

plant-status.name: Auga statuss
plant-status.description: The Plant Status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.

sensor.name: Sensors
sensor.description: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.

shopping-list.name: Iepirkumu saraksts
shopping-list.description: The Shopping List card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your shopping list.
shopping-list.integration_not_loaded: This card requires the `shopping_list` integration to be set up.

thermostat.name: Termostats
thermostat.description: The Thermostat card gives control of your climate entity. Allowing you to change the temperature and mode of the entity.

vertical-stack.name: Vertical Stack
vertical-stack.description: The Vertical Stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.

weather-forecast.name: Laikapstākļu prognoze
weather-forecast.description: The Weather Forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.

panel_mode.title: Panel Mode?
panel_mode.description: This renders the first card at full width. Other cards in this view as well as badges will not be rendered.
panel_mode.warning_multiple_cards: This view contains more than one card, but a panel view can only show 1 card.

warning.starting: Home Assistant is starting, not everything may be available yet

changed_toast.message: Šī informācijas paneļa Lovelace UI konfigurācija tika atjaunināta. Vēlaties atsvaidzināt, lai redzētu izmaiņas?

force_narrow.description: Sānjosla pēc noklusējuma tiks slēpta, līdzīgi kā mobilajās ierīcēs.

customize_sidebar.header: Mainīt secību un slēpt sānjoslas vienumus
customize_sidebar.description: Varat arī nospiest un turēt sānjoslas galveni, lai aktivizētu rediģēšanas režīmu.

vibrate.description: Iespējot vai atspējot vibrāciju šajā ierīcē, kontrolējot ierīces.

enable_shortcuts.description: Enable or disable keyboard shortcuts for performing various actions in the UI.

suspend.description: Vai pārtraukt savienojumu ar serveri pēc 5 neativitātes minūtēm?

add_device_prompt.title: What should this device be called?

refresh_tokens.description: Katra atsvaidzināšanas pilvara apzīmē pieteikšanās sesiju. Atsvaidzināšanas pilvaras tiks automātiski noņemtas, kad Jūs izrakstīsieties. Jūsu kontam šobrīd aktīvas ir sekojošas atsvaidzināšanas pilvaras.
refresh_tokens.confirm_delete: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst piekļuves pilnvaru {name}?

long_lived_access_tokens.description: Izveidojiet ilgtermiņa piekļuves pilnvaras, lai ļautu jūsu skriptiem mijiedarboties ar jūsu Home Assistant instanci. Katra pilnvara būs derīga 10 gadus pēc tās izveidošanas. Pašlaik ir aktīvas sekojošas ilgtermiņa piekļuves pilvaras.
long_lived_access_tokens.confirm_delete: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst piekļuves pilnvaru {name}?
long_lived_access_tokens.name: Nosaukums
long_lived_access_tokens.prompt_copy_token: Kopējiet savu piekļuves pilnvaru. Tas vairs netiks rādīts.
long_lived_access_tokens.empty_state: Jums vēl nav ilgtermiņa piekļuves pilnvaru.

page-authorize.authorizing_client: Jūs gatavojaties piešķirt {clientId} piekļuvi jūsu Home Assistant.

mfa.description: Atveriet **{mfa_module_name}** savā ierīcē, lai skatītu divu faktoru autentifikācijas kodu un verificētu savu identitāti:

abort.login_expired: Sesija ir beigusies, lūdzu, ielogojaties vēlreiz.

mfa.description: Atveriet **{mfa_module_name}** savā ierīcē, lai skatītu divu faktoru autentifikācijas kodu un verificētu savu identitāti:

init.description: Lūdzu, ievadiet API paroli savā HTTP konfigurācijā:

mfa.description: Atveriet **{mfa_module_name}** savā ierīcē, lai skatītu divu faktoru autentifikācijas kodu un verificētu savu identitāti:

init.description: Lūdzu, atlasiet lietotāju, kuru vēlaties pieteikties kā:

abort.not_whitelisted: Jūsu dators nav iekļauts baltajā sarakstā.

demo.introduction: Laipni lūgts mājās! Jūs esat sasniedzis Home Assistant demonstrāciju, kurā mēs parādām labākos lietotāja kopienas izveidotos lietotāja interfeisus.

events.title: Notikumi
events.description: Fire an event on the event bus.
events.alert_event_type: Event type is a mandatory field

services.title: Services
services.description: The service dev tool allows you to call any available service in Home Assistant.
services.select_service: Select a service to see the description

states.title: Stāvokļi
states.description1: Set the representation of a device within Home Assistant.
states.description2: This will not communicate with the actual device.

templates.title: Template
templates.description: Templates are rendered using the Jinja2 template engine with some Home Assistant specific extensions.
templates.time: This template updates at the start of each minute.
templates.all_listeners: This template listens for all state changed events.
templates.no_listeners: This template does not listen for any events and will not update automatically.
templates.listeners: This template listens for the following state changed events:

page-onboarding.intro: Vai esat gatavs pamodināt savu māju, atgūt savu konfidencialitāti un pievienoties pasaules mēroga kopienai?

core-config.intro: Sveiki {name}! Laipni lūdzam Home Assistant. Kā jūs vēlētos nosaukt savas mājas?
core-config.intro_location: Mēs gribētu zināt, kur tu dzīvo. Šī informācija palīdzēs parādīt informāciju un iestatīt uz saules bāzes balstītas automātikas. Šie dati nekad netiek koplietoti ārpus jūsu tīkla.
core-config.intro_location_detect: Mēs varam palīdzēt jums aizpildīt šo informāciju, iesniedzot vienreizēju pieprasījumu ārējam pakalpojumam.
core-config.location_name: Name of your Home Assistant installation

integration.intro: Home Assistant ierīces un pakalpojumi tiek parādītas kā integrācijas. Tos var iestatīt tūlīt vai izdarīt vēlāk konfigurācijas ekrānā.

restore.description: Alternatively you can restore from a previous snapshot.

external_panel.question_trust: Vai Jūs uzticaties ārējam panelim {name} uz {link}?
external_panel.complete_access: Tai būs pieejami visi dati no Home Assistant
external_panel.hide_message: Pārskatiet komponentes panel_custom dokumentus, lai paslēptu šo paziņojumu

shopping-list.microphone_tip: Pieskarieties mikrofonam augšējā labajā stūrī un sakiet vai rakstiet "Pievienot konfektes manam iepirkumu sarakstam"
